original_title: Through The Eyes Of Yuja: A road movie by Anaïs & Olivier Spiro
overview: With more than 120 performances a year, Yuja Wang lives a nomadic lifestyle. Travelling the world, two extra small trolley suitcases carry the essentials for a two week trip: dresses, shoes, iPad, iPod, and Smartphone. The 27-year-old Yuja leads a new generation of pianists who can comfortably play anything thanks to phenomenal technique and healthy self-confidence. Even so, she stands squarely in the tradition of great piano virtuosi, offering much more than just technical wizardry alone...
title: Through The Eyes Of Yuja: A road movie by Anaïs & Olivier Spiro
